text:
Carlos Tevez will earn £29,285 while he SLEEPS from his massive Shanghai Shenhua deal 
The Argentinian striker set to earn £63,960,000 during his two-year deal By TOM SHEEN Comments CARLOS TEVEZ will earn more than the average wage of a Briton while he is ASLEEP. 
The Argentinian left boyhood club Boca Juniors to sign an eye-watering £63,960,000 two-year deal with Chinese Super League side Shanghai Shenua. 3 Carlos Tevez has become the world’s richest footballer after moving to Shanghai Shenhua 
His crazy salary – a deal that makes Tevez the richest footballer in the world – sees the striker earn more in eight hours than a lot of people in the UK do in a year. 
According to the latest figures, the average wage in the UK was £28,000. 
With a yearly salary of £31,980,000, Tevez picks up an astonishing £2,767,500 a month. 
That’s £615,000 a week, £87,857 every day. 
Tevez earns £61 a minute and £1.01 every single SECOND. Boca netted an incredible £73m for selling the star – but Tevez will have to pay a £41m fine if he doesn’t stay in the Far East for the full length of his deal. 
Tevez will join former Premier League strikers Demba Ba and Obafemi Martins at Shanghai.
